document_data.name: ''Treads of Falling Shadow''
document_data.mainbody: e boots made the wearer partially incorporeal and shadowy, causing threats to pass right through them. It also made them exceptionally quick and agile as they raced about.
document_data.Powers: The boots made the wearer partially incorporeal and shadowy, causing threats to pass right through them. It also made them exceptionally quick and agile as they raced about.
document_data.History: The boots were recovered from [[Shadovar]] agents around Greenweald Lane, who attempted to recover a piece of the ''[[Abyssal Planus Mechanus Nether Scroll]]'' from the [[Harpers]].
